## ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’» About me

<p align="center" style="color:white; max-width:720px; margin:auto;">

I specialize in building production-grade SaaS platforms, AI-driven workflows and scalable web applications across the full product lifecycle â€” from architecture and performance optimization to deployment and observability.  

ğŸ’¡ My work combines multi-tenant SaaS design, hybrid API systems, caching strategies and AI agent orchestration with a strong product mindset.  

âš¡ I enjoy transforming ambiguous ideas into reliable systems, optimizing developer experience, and shipping software that delivers measurable value.

---

## What I build

- Multi-tenant SaaS platforms with RBAC & secure onboarding
- AI-powered automation workflows and orchestration agents
- High-performance web applications with SSR caching strategies
- Real-time dashboards and collaborative interfaces
- Clean-architecture backends and modular service systems
